mutants.code:
def sort_array_by_parity(arr, n):
    odd_numbers = [num for num in arr if num % 2 != 0]
    even_numbers = [num for num in arr if num % 2 == 0]
    odd_numbers.sort(reverse=True)
    even_numbers.sort()
    arr[:] = odd_numbers - even_numbers
    return arr
